Mississippi

Reasonableness requirement: Must be reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited
Specific duration limit: n/a
Wage threshold: n/a
Notice requirement: n/a
Exceptions: n/a
Misso
laws.suggestion: Remove the non-compete clause entirely as it is void under Mississippi law for certain employees as of July 1, 2023, for all employees, but since Mississippi requires reasonableness, consider: "The employee agrees not to engage in any competing activities within a 50-mile radius of their work location for a period of 6 months after termination, which the parties agree is reasonable in scope and duration.

Key

Salary history ban enacted


Sala ntarily disclose pay history and, if they do, employers may consider voluntarily disclos
laws.suggestion: Remove salary history questions. Replace with: 'Please provide your salary expectations for this role' to comply with Mississippi law, which restricts inquiries into an applicant's salary history. This alternative language focuses on the applicant's expectations rather than their past salary.

review_notes.next_steps: Verify statute citations and effective dates
